name: Top down Adventure Game
description:
A small game made while learning how to create levels with procedural generation.

Use WASD for movement
Left click to swing your sword
Right click to cast a fireball spell
Press 1 to use a potion
Press E to enter a doorway to the next level if you have a key

You may also press tab to skip ahead a level. (this is solely for testing and may cause issues)

The game is nearly impossible on higher levels as the real goal of this project was the work on procedural generation and not the gameplay. May come back to this and add some things at some point.
